title: Dr. Kabil khans interview. The one who was targeted by UP gov, for being a hero.
selftext: The start is Malayalam but the interview is in English...
comments: Isn't his name Kafeel Khan? His only fault was trying to save the life of young children. Of course Little Fanta the hero of  UP did not want Kafeel Khan to be a hero by saving dying children.
What he is saying is heart touching, 1 year in jail for doing his duty to his fellow citizens. And those who were supposed to take care of their citizens were waiting for 10% commission

They tried harming his family and reputation also. His only fault is he was kind towards his patients. If people in power were 1%  as kind hearted as him,our nation would have been much better.

India is a rich country where the rulers prevent the wealth being used for the welfare of its people.
